content: hi, i'm installing zulip in a fresh Ubuntu 18.04 Virtual machine but, durign the installaiotn scirpts, receive and error of DNS during the creation of certificate .. i presume

Some challenges have failed.
IMPORTANT NOTES:

  • The following errors were reported by the server:

    Domain: chat.mydomain.com
    Type: dns
    Detail: DNS problem: NXDOMAIN looking up A for chat.mydomain.com
is check with nslookup all work fine and the server resolve correctly the local hostname

SOLVED!the problem was that you need to first create the dns record from your provider because letscrypt looks for it during the installation.
Also you need to do NAT on your firewall on port 80 and then 443
